name: Primary Grades
description: For grades 1, 2, and 3 primary grade students have a daily core curriculum that includes language arts, math, religion, science and social studies. All students receive enrichment classes that include physical education, music, art and computer technology. Science is augmented by regular use of Elevate Science, providing an opportunity for hands-on scientific study. Math standards are in alignment with the State of California's Common Core Standards for Mathematical Content and Mathematical Prac
